summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West Rose Street from 45th Avenue Southwest to 46th Avenue Southwest; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 17005 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
